review: We like it a lot it hooked us with netflix and prime
author: Sabrina Gipson

review: I hesitate to critisize at this point because I am not an expert in electronics.  So far I have yet to see any6 benefit in using Firestick, but it may be just my ineptness.  I will keep trying.
author: Charles A. Hird "Izaak"

review: Easy to set up and works perfectly. I have roku, Amazon Fire TV box, and Apple TV and Amazon was my favorite. The stick works just as well as the box. Love it
author: Joanna Bianco

review: Sadly I have yet to watch an entire hour of television via Netflix without the feed dropping. Confusingly enough, the error message reads that I 'may not be connected to the internet,' yet when I check the setting on my Stick it reads as connected with 'very good' signal strength. I end up having to reset the Stick to continue to stream.I'll keep it for another week, but if it continues to be a problem it will go back.
author: Stephen R. Peluso

review: It is a very fine product. I like it's quality and performance. The only thing is when using the slingbox app instead of a copy of the controller on screen like other apps it has a somewhat cumbersome system to go through. Even though it is a good system.

review: Best gadget that I brought this year!!!
